defaultLocale.name: Smart HTTPS
defaultLocale.description: Automatically changes HTTP protocol to HTTPS, and if loading encounters error, reverts it back to HTTP.

defaultLocale.name: Stylus
defaultLocale.description: Redesign the web with Stylus, a user styles manager. Stylus allows you to easily install themes and skins for many popular sites.

locales.name: Stylus
locales.description: Redesign the web with Stylus, a user styles manager. Stylus allows you to easily install themes and skins for many popular sites.

locales.name: Stylus
locales.description: Stylus でウェブのデザインを変更しましょう。これは、ユーザースタイルを管理するツールです。Stylus を利用すると、多くの人気サイト向けのテーマやスキンを簡単にインストールできます。

locales.name: Stylus
locales.description: Disaini veeb ümber kasutajastiilide halduri Stylus'iga. Stylus võimaldab sul lihtsalt paigaldada teemasid ja välimusi mitmetele populaarsetele saitidele.

locales.name: Stylus
locales.description: Reestruturar a web com o Stylus, um gestor de estilos do utilizador. O Stylus permite-te instalar facilmente temas e skins para muitos sites populares.

locales.name: Stylus
locales.description: Redesign the web with Stylus, a user styles manager. Stylus allows you to easily install themes and skins for many popular sites.

locales.name: Stylus
locales.description: Redesign the web with Stylus, a user styles manager. Stylus allows you to easily install themes and skins for many popular sites.

locales.name: Stylus
locales.description: Changez l'apparence du Web grâce à Stylus, un outil de gestion des styles utilisateur. Stylus vous permet d'installer facilement des thèmes et des habillages pour Google, Facebook, YouTube, orkut et bien d'autres sites encore.

locales.name: Stylus
locales.description: Пресъздайте стила на Мрежата със Стайлус, разширението за стилове. То ви позволява лесно да инсталиране теми за много сайтове.

locales.name: Stylus
locales.description: Style:a om webben med Stylus, en användarstils-hanterare. Stylus låter dig enkelt installera teman och skal för många populära sidor.

locales.name: Stylus
locales.description: Tervezd újra a webet a Stylus stíluskezelővel. A Stylus lehetővé teszi a témák és egyéni külsők egyszerű telepítését sok népszerű oldalhoz.

locales.name: Stylus
locales.description: Změňte vzhled webů pomocí správce uživatelských stylů. Stylus umožňuje snadnou instalaci vzhledů a modifikací pro spoustu webů.

locales.name: Stylus
locales.description: يمكنك تغيير نمط الويب باستخدام Stylus، وهي أداة لإدارة أنماط المستخدم. وتتيح Stylus لك بسهولة تثبيت المظاهر والأشكال الخارجية لكل من Google، وFacebook وYouTube وOrkut فضلاً عن الكثير جدًا من مواقع الويب الأخرى.

locales.name: Stylus
locales.description: Stylus로 웹페이지를 새롭게 디자인해보세요. 유명한 사이트의 테마, 스킨도 간단하게 설치할 수 있는 사용자 스타일 관리자입니다.

locales.name: Stylus
locales.description: Промени уеба със Stylus, мениджър на потребителски стилове. Stylus ти позволява лесно да инсталираш теми и скинове за много популярни сайтове.

locales.name: Stylus
locales.description: Redesign the web with Stylus, a user-style manager. Stylus allows you to easily install themes and skins for many popular sites.

locales.name: Stylus
locales.description: Modifica lo stile del Web con Stylus, un gestore di stili utente. Stylus consente di installare facilmente temi e skin per Google, Facebook, YouTube, Orkut e moltissimi altri siti.

locales.name: Stylus
locales.description: Gestalte das Web neu mit Stylus, dem Style Manager. Stylus ermöglicht dir ganz einfach Themes und Designs für viele beliebte Webseiten zu installieren.

locales.name: Stylus
locales.description: Redesign the web with Stylus, a user styles manager. Stylus allows you to easily install themes and skins for many popular sites.

locales.name: Stylus
locales.description: Redesign the web with Stylus, a user styles manager. Stylus allows you to easily install themes and skins for many popular sites.

locales.name: Stylus
locales.description: Stylus，一个用户样式管理器，帮助您重新定义网页样式。Stylus易于为Google，Facebook，Youtube，Orkut以及其它各类型网站安装样式和主题。

locales.name: Stylus
locales.description: Измените стил интернет мреже управљачем корисничких стилова. Stylus вам омогућава да лако инсталирате теме и скинове за многе популарне сајтове.

locales.name: Stylus
locales.description: Redesign the web with Stylus, a user styles manager. Stylus allows you to easily install themes and skins for many popular sites.

locales.name: Stylus
locales.description: Stylus 是一个调整网页外观的用户样式管理器。它可让您轻松地为许多热门网站网站安装主题和皮肤。

locales.name: Stylus
locales.description: Настраивайте стили веб-сайтов с помощью менеджера стилей Stylus. Он позволяет легко установить темы и изменить внешний вид сайтов Google, Facebook, YouTube, Orkut и множества других веб-страниц.

locales.name: Stylus
locales.description: Przeprojektuj sieć za pomocą Stylusa – menedżera stylów użytkownika. Stylus umożliwia łatwe instalowanie motywów i skórek dla wielu popularnych witryn.

locales.name: Stylus
locales.description: Uudelleen stailaa netti Stylusillä, käyttäjän tyyli hallintapaneelilla. Stylus antaa sinun helposti asentaa teemoja ja skinejä palvelluille kuten Google, Facebook, YouTube, Orkut, ja monelle, monelle muulle sivustolle.

locales.name: Stylus
locales.description: Επαναπροσδιορίση του διαδίκτυου με το  Stylus, έναν διαχειριστή στυλ. Το Stylus σας επιτρέπει να εγκαταστήσετε εύκολα themes και skins για πολλές δημοφιλείς ιστοσελίδες.

locales.name: Stylus
locales.description: Stilizați internetul cu Stylus, un manager de teme. Stylus vă permite să instalați cu ușurință teme pentru multe site-uri populare.

locales.name: Stylus
locales.description: Rediseñe la web con Stylus, un administrador de estilos de usuario. Stylus le permite instalar fácilmente temas y coberturas para muchos sitios populares.

locales.name: Stylus
locales.description: Mude o estilo da web com o Stylus, um gerenciador de estilos do usuário. O Stylus permite instalar facilmente temas e skins para Google, Facebook, YouTube, Orkut e muitos, muitos outros sites.

locales.name: Stylus
locales.description: Redesign the web with Stylus, a user styles manager. Stylus allows you to easily install themes and skins for many popular sites.

locales.name: Stylus
locales.description: 用Stylus（一個用戶樣式管理器）重塑網頁。 Stylus 讓你能為诸多主流網站輕鬆的安裝主題和皮膚。

locales.name: Stylus
locales.description: עיצוב מחדש של האינטרנט באמצעות Stylus, מנהל סגנונות משתמש. Stylus מאפשר לך להתקין בקלות עיצובים וערכות נושא עבור אתרים פופולריים רבים.

locales.name: Stylus
locales.description: Kullanıcı stil yöneticisi Stylus ile Web'in stilini yenileyin. Stylus Google, Facebook, YouTube, Orkut ve diğer pek çok site için temalar ve görünüm yüklemenize imkân tanır.

locales.name: Stylus
locales.description: Voorzie het web van een ander uiterlijk met Stylus, een gebruikersstijlbeheerder. Met Stylus kunt u eenvoudig thema’s en stijlen voor veel populaire websites installeren.

defaultLocale.name: Tab Suspender (memory saver)
defaultLocale.description: Automatically suspend (hibernate) inactive tabs to free up system resources
defaultLocale.creator: Richard Neomy

defaultLocale.name: uMatrix

locales.description: Suuna ja klõpsa, et keelata/lubada veebilehitseja kõiki päringud. Sellega saab keelata skripte, iframe-e, reklaame, facebook'i jne.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill

locales.name: uMatrix
locales.description: Tunjuk & klik untuk melarang/mengizinkan permintaan yang dibuat peramban anda. Gunakan untuk memblokir skrip, iframe, iklan, dll.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill

locales.name: uMatrix
locales.description: আপনার ব্রাউজার দ্বারা করা যে কোন শ্রেণীর অনুরোধ অনুমতি/নিষেধ করতে পয়েন্ট ও ক্লিক করুন। স্ক্রিপ্ট, আইফ্রেম, বিজ্ঞাপন, ফেসবুক, ইত্যাদি ব্লক এটি ব্যবহার করুন।
locales.creator: Raymond Hill

locales.description: Point & click to forbid/allow any class of requests made by your browser. Use it to block scripts, iframes, ads, facebook, etc.

locales.creator: Raymond Hill

locales.name: uMatrix
locales.description: Tiltsd le, vagy engedélyezd egy kattintással a böngésző által létrehozott lekéréseket csoportosítva – szkriptek, iframe-ek, stb.

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: ಕೊನೆಗೂ, ಒಂದು ದಕ್ಷ ನಿರ್ಬಂಧಕ. ಮಿತವಾದ ಸಿಪಿಯೂ ಹಾಗು ಮೆಮೊರಿ ಬಳಕೆ.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Ефективний блокувальник реклами таки з’явився. Не навантажує процесор та пам'ять.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: وأخيراً, مانع اعلانات كفوء. خفيف على المعالج و الذاكرة.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Cuối cùng, đã có một công cụ chặn quảng cáo hiệu quả, tiêu tốn ít CPU và bộ nhớ.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: როგორც იქნა, მძლავრი და შედეგიანი რეკლამების შემზღუდავი. ზოგავს CPU-ს და მეხსიერებას.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: آخر کار، ایک مؤثر اشتہار کو روکنے والا، یہ کم cpu اور میموری لیتا ہے.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: 이 부가 기능은 효율적인 차단기입니다. CPU와 메모리에 주는 부담이 적습니다.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Finalmente, un blocker efficiente. Leggero sulla CPU e sulla memoria.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Finfine rendimenta reklamoblokilo. Afabla por ĉefprocesoro kaj memoro.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Endelig en effektiv blokkeringsutvidelse. Lavt CPU- og minnebruk.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Pagaliau, efektyvus blokatorius, neapkraunantis nei procesoriaus, nei darbinės atminties.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Më në fund, një bllokues efikas që nuk e rëndon procesorin dhe memorien.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: आख़िरकार, क्रोमियम-बेस्ड ब्राउज़रों के लिए एक कुशल अवरोधक। CPU और स्मृति पर आसान।
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: இறுதியாக, ஒரு திறமையான விளம்பரத் தடுப்பான். கணினியின் மையச் செயற்பகுதியின் மேலும் நினைவகத்தின் மேலும் இலகுவானது.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Axır ki, prosessor və yaddaş yükünü azaldan səmərəli bir əngəlləyici var.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Endlich ein effizienter Blocker. Prozessor-freundlich und bescheiden beim Speicherbedarf.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: शेवटी, एक कार्यक्षम ब्लॉकर क्रोमियम आधारित ब्राउझरांसाठी. सीपीयू आणि मेमरी वर सोपे जातो.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Endelig en effektiv blokkeringsutvidelse. Lavt CPU- og minnebruk.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: มาแล้ว! โปรแกรมบล็อกโฆษณาเบาเบา ไม่กิน ซีพียู หรือ แรม
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Finally, an efficient blocker. Easy on CPU and memory.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Ó fin, un bloqueador eficiente que non chupa toda a memoria e o procesador.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Finalment, un blocador eficient que utilitza pocs recursos de memòria i processador.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Konečne efektívny blokovač. Nezaťažuje CPU ani pamäť.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Коначно, ефикасан блокатор. Ниски процесорски и меморијски захтеви.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Тинех Интернет тишкерӳҫӗ валли хӑвӑрт та витӗмлӗ чаркӑч пур.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: അവസാനം, ഒരു കാര്യക്ഷമമായ ബ്ലോക്കര്‍. ലഘുവായ CPU, memory ഉപയോഗം.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: بالاخره، یک بلاکر کارآمد. کم حجم بر روی پردازنده و حافظه.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Akhirnya, penyekat yang cekap. Tidak membebankan CPU dan memori.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: 一款高效的网络请求过滤工具，占用极低的内存和 CPU。
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Наконец-то, быстрый и эффективный блокировщик для браузеров.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Nareszcie skuteczny bloker charakteryzujący się niskim użyciem procesora i pamięci.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Končno, učinkovita, procesorju in pomnilniku prijazna razširitev za blokiranje oglasov.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Beidzot, efektīvs bloķētājs. Nepārslogo procesoru un atmiņu.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Sa wakas! Isang magaling na blocker para sa Chromium-based browsers. Magaan sa CPU at memory.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Konačno, efikasan blokator. Lak na CPU i memoriji.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Viimeinkin tehokas ja kevyt mainosten estäjä.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Վերջապես արդյունավետ արգելափակիչ։ Թեթև CPU֊ի ու հիշողության համար։

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Жарнамаларды жақсы өшіретін Addon'дардың бірі. Компьютердің қуатың аз алады.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Konačno, efikasan bloker. Štedljiv na procesoru i memoriji.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Επιτέλους, ένας αποτελεσματικός blocker. Ελαφρύς για τον επεξεργαστή και τη μνήμη.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Por fin, un bloqueador eficiente con uso mínimo de procesador y memoria.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Finalmente, um bloqueador eficiente. Com baixo uso de memória e CPU.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: În sfârșit, un blocant eficient. Are un impact mic asupra procesorului și memoriei.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: 終於有套使用不多的 CPU 及記憶體資源的高效率阻擋器。

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: סוף סוף, חוסם יעיל. קל על המעבד והזיכרון.
locales.creator: Raymond Hill & contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Sonunda, etkili bir engelleyici. İşlemciyi ve belleği yormaz.

locales.name: uBlock Origin
